name: Payment before sale
text: [§507-68]  Payment before sale.  Any person claiming a right to the goods must pay the amount necessary to satisfy the lien and the reasonable expenses incurred for particular actions taken pursuant to this part.  In that event, the goods shall not be sold, but shall be retained by the owner subject to the terms of this part pending a court order directing disposition of the property. [L 1984, c 239, pt of §1]
